findings.details: Navigation links rely on default padding. Increasing tap target size on coarse pointer devices improves mobile usability.
Scanned templates and recent posts for placeholder domains; no obvious placeholders found. Live validation requires network access.
Pages include descriptions/keywords, and default layout uses jekyll-seo-tag with robots directives.
Typography and spacing are consistent; minor mobile touch optimizations remain.

recommendations: Increase navigation tap targets on coarse pointer devices
Run automated link validation when network access is available
